name: CustomMetadata

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the custom metadata.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The label of the custom metadata record.

fields.name: protected_x
fields.description: Property that describes whether the custom metadata record is a protected component.

fields.name: values
fields.description: A list of custom metadata values, such as custom fields, for the custom metadata record.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.CustomMetadata.

description: Represents records of custom metadata types.
